ingredients: Kalamata olives: 1/2 cup, pitted and sliced
Canned chickpeas: 1 can (15 ounces), rinsed and drained
instructions: Press tofu for at least 20 minutes to remove excess water.

In a medium bowl, toss tofu with 1 tablespoon olive oil, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, oregano, garlic powder, smoked paprika, 1/2 teaspoon salt, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, and cornstarch until evenly coated.
Spread tofu in a single layer on a parchment-lined baking sheet.
Bake for 25-30 minutes, flipping halfway, until golden and crispy.
Rinse quinoa thoroughly under cold water.
Combine rinsed quinoa and vegetable broth in a medium saucepan.
